'''Simple Vault Key I''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained from an [[Investigation]] spot atop a shipwreck in the eastern part of [[Erinnyes Forest]]. It can be found at the tallest point of the shipwreck, inside a bird nest.

It is used with [[Simple Vault Key II]] and [[Simple Vault Key III]] to open the vault inside the shipwreck containing a [[Hydroculus]] and a Precious Chest with a [[Foggy Forest Branch]].
